Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Kedzie, Marquette, California and 63rd, due to fire department activity near 63rd/Sacramento

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Kedzie, Marquette, California and 63rd then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 63rd/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
